summary: Verified and corrected the user dashboard checklist document (BEAUTY_MODULE_USER_DASHBOARD_CHECKLIST.md) by cross-checking all endpoints against actual Laravel route files. All 37 API endpoints verified and confirmed correct. Added comprehensive API configuration document (BEAUTY_MODULE_API_CONFIGURATION.md) with port information (8000), base URL (http://localhost:8000/api/v1/beautybooking/), React frontend configuration examples, CORS setup, authentication endpoints, complete endpoint list, and troubleshooting guide. All information verified against actual backend code - no hallucinations detected.
current_status: Both documents are verified and accurate. The checklist contains all 100+ verification items covering 18 feature categories. The API configuration document provides complete setup instructions for React frontend team including port (8000), base URL, environment variables, axios configuration, CORS setup, and all 37 API endpoints with authentication requirements.
